limelightExtension.limelight.key_binding: Allows you to search for and invoke keybinds
Adds mod config screen entries to easily configure mods
limelightExtension.limelight.lavender.de: Allows quickly opening entries from books in your inventory
limelightExtension.limelight.bangs.desc: Allows easily specifying only specific extensions with !bang syntax
limelightExtension.limelight.game_settin: Control game settings directly from the command palette.
limelightExtension.limelight.wiki.desc: Queries the Minecraft wiki and various mod wikis.
text.config.limelight.title: Limelight
text.config.limelight.option.pauseGameWh: Pause game while in the screen
If true, the Limelight screen will pause the game while in singleplayer
